question: The rock-cut architecture represents one of the most important sources of our knowledge of early Indian art and history. Discuss.
What was the difference between Mahatma Gandhi and Rabindranath Tagore in their approach towards education and nationalism?
Discuss the main objectives of Population Education and point out the measures to achieve them in India in detail.
'Constitutionally guaranteed judicial independence is a prerequisite of democracy'. Comment.
The role of NGOs in the developmental process has been under scrutiny. In the light of the statement, discuss the role of NGOs in the development process.
'The long-sustained image of India as a leader of the oppressed and marginalised nations has disappeared on account of its new policy of acquiring a dominant position in the world'. Discuss.
Do you agree that the Indian economy has experienced V-shaped recovery? Give reasons in support of your answer.
What are the major challenges of Public Distribution System (PDS) in India? How can it be made effective and transparent?
Discuss the types of organised crimes. Describe the linkages between terrorists and organised crime that exist at the national and transnational levels.
What is the role of S-400 air defence system in strengthening India's defence mechanism?
What do you understand by 'probity' in public life? What are the difficulties in practicing it in the present times? How can these difficulties be overcome?
What is meant by emotional intelligence and how can it be developed in people? How does it help an individual in taking ethical decisions?
What are the main factors responsible for gender inequality in India? Discuss the contribution of Savitribai Phule in this regard.
To what extent is the Central Administrative Tribunal (CAT) a substitute for High Courts? Explain.
What are the key features of the National Clean Air Programme (NCAP)?
